members.name: _id
members.doc: Rating definition attribute identifier

members.doc: Average of attribute values

members.name: total
members.doc: Total amount of given attributes

members.doc: Attribute breakdown

members.doc: Attribute id for which average will be computed.

members.doc: Entities ids

members.name: namespace
members.doc: Entities namespace

members.name: entityAverages
members.doc: Entity averages

members.name: namespace
members.doc: Entities namespace

members.name: attributeId
members.doc: Attribute ID.

members.name: definitionId
members.doc: Definition ID.

members.name: ratingOwner
members.doc: Set rating's owner explicitly. Ignored when visitor/member calls API.

members.name: relatedContentIds
members.doc:
Optional field to indicated to what entities this rating relates to
Gives ability to query ratings which relates to entity

members.name: value
members.doc: Value to set for the specified attribute.

members.name: rating
members.doc: The created rating.

members.name: cursor
members.doc: Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous page in the list of results.

members.name: filter
members.doc: documents matching this filter wil be deleted. only filterable documents defined in document_type can be used for filtering

members.name: documentIds
members.doc: ids of the documents to delete

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of the rating to delete.

members.name: revision
members.doc: The revision number of the rating.

members.name: _id
members.doc: random GUID so clients can tell if event was already handled

members.name: entityFqdn
members.doc:
Assumes actions are also always typed to an entity_type
Example: wix.stores.catalog.product, wix.bookings.session, wix.payments.transaction

members.name: entityId
members.doc:
Assuming that all messages including Actions have id
Example: The id of the specific order, the id of a specific campaign

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: The time of the event. Useful if there was a delay in dipatching

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

members.name: slug
members.doc:
This is top level to ease client code dipatching of messages (switch on entity_fqdn+slug)
This is although the created/updated/deleted notion is duplication of the oneof types
Example: created/updated/deleted/started/completed/email_opened

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc:
A field that should be set if this event was triggered by an anonymize request.
For example you must set it to true when sending an event as a result of a GDPR right to be forgotten request.
NOTE: This field is not relevant for `EntityCreatedEvent` but is located here for better ergonomics of consumers.

members.name: average
members.doc: Average entity rating

members.name: entityId
members.doc: Entity id

members.name: total
members.doc: Total amount of ratings

members.name: currentEntityAsJson
members.doc:
Since platformized APIs only expose PATCH and not PUT we can't assume that the fields sent from the client are the actual diff.
This means that to generate a list of changed fields (as opposed to sent fields) one needs to traverse both objects.
We don't want to impose this on all developers and so we leave this traversal to the notification recipients which need it.

members.name: attributeIds
members.doc: List of attributes to get summary of.

members.name: entityId
members.doc: Entity ID.

members.name: namespace
members.doc: Ratings namespace whose summary is to be returned.

members.name: attributeSummaries
members.doc: Entity attributes summary.

members.name: entityId
members.doc: Summary entity ID.

members.name: namespace
members.doc: Summary namespace.

members.name: attributeIds
members.doc: list of attributes to get summary of.

members.name: namespace
members.doc: Ratings namespace whose summary is to be returned.

members.name: attributeSummaries
members.doc: Namespace attributes summary.

members.name: namespace
members.doc: Summary namespace.

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of the rating to retrieve.

members.name: rating
members.doc: The retrieved rating.

members.name: anonymousVisitorId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has not logged in to the site.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: ID of of a contact in the site's [CRM by Ascend](https://www.wix.com/ascend/crm) system.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has logged in to the site.

members.name: document
members.doc: document with mandatory fields (id) and with fields specific to the type of the document

members.name: document
members.doc: partial document to apply

members.name: filter
members.doc: documents matching this filter will be updated

members.name: documents
members.doc: documents to index or update

members.name: documents
members.doc: documents to update

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through the result pages using `next` and `prev`. Returned if cursor paging is used.

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor token pointing to a page of results. Not used in the first request. Following requests use the cursor token and not `filter` or `sort`.

members.name: filter
sort
members.doc:
Sort object in the following format:
`[{"fieldName":"sortField1","order":"ASC"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","order":"DESC"}]`

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Represents the time this Rating was created

members.name: _id
members.doc: Rating ID

members.name: _updatedDate
members.doc: Represents the time this Rating was last updated

members.name: attributeId
members.doc: Attribute id which is defined by definition

members.name: definitionId
members.doc: Reference to namespace/entity ratings definition

members.name: entityId
members.doc: Indication of what entity owns given current Rating

members.name: namespace
members.doc: Used to identity type of entity which is being rated

members.name: owner
members.doc: Rating's owner

members.name: relatedContentIds
members.doc:
Optional field to indicated to what entities this rating relates to
Gives ability to query ratings which relates to entity

members.name: revision
members.doc: Represents the current state of an item. Each time the item is modified, its `revision` changes. for an update operation to succeed, you MUST pass the latest revision

members.name: value
members.doc: Numeric value of rating

members.name: documentIds
members.doc: the document types related to this notification

members.name: documentType
members.doc: the relevant document type

members.name: indexingEventType
members.doc:
the type of notification
One of:
Reindex,
Unknown

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: order
members.doc:
Sort order.
One of:
ASC,
DESC

members.name: addDocuments
members.doc: one or more search documents

members.name: correlationId
members.doc: id to pass to processing notification

members.name: deleteByFilter
members.doc: delete documents matching filter

members.name: deleteByIds
members.doc: delete by document ids

members.name: documentType
members.doc: type of the documents

members.name: language
members.doc: language of the documents (mandatory)

members.name: removeDocumentIds
members.doc: one or more ids of indexed documents to be removed. Removal will happen before addition (if both provided)

members.name: update
members.doc: insert/update documents

members.name: updateByFilter
members.doc: update internal documents matching filter

members.name: updateExisting
members.doc: update only existing documents

members.name: _id
members.doc: Ratings ID.

members.name: revision
members.doc: Revision to be updated.

members.name: value
members.doc: New numeric value of rating

members.name: rating
members.doc: The updated rating.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total amount of ratings with given value

members.name: value
members.doc: Ratings value
